Title: Where Ravens Go
Text: Babylonia decided to dispatch several squads in the unknown regions of West Africa, including even elite squads like Gray Raven... (Requirement: 5 characters)

Title: Complete Search
Text: Liv has temporarily joined the mission to find an important tactical device. Beside Liv is the lucky survivor of the Goldfinch squad, Browning...

Title: Return
Text: A day ago, Browning, the leader of the Goldfinch squad, decided to look for more info about the Golden Vortex with the Goldfinch members...

Title: Another Return
Text: Within the Golden Vortex, Lee decided to return and find Liv who he has lost contact with...

Title: Not Forsaken
Text: Watanabe takes the Forsaken to the Golden Vortex. He plans to save his trapped comrades... (Requirement: 6 characters)

Title: Lone Arrow
Text: Bianca sneaked into the Golden Vortex, but she was met with the resistance of its guardians. She is all alone and without any help...

Title: Endurance Game
Text: Kamui has been following the Ascendant Roland and entered the Golden Vortex. Before so, they had been battling for several hundred hours straight...

Title: Temper
Text: The fight between Watanabe and Bianca comes to an end, but the rescued Forsaken seem to be in a strange condition...

Title: Powerful Reinforcement
Text: After nearly 4 hours of communication block, HQ sent Karenina to clear out the heavy fog in the Golden Vortex... (This chapter requires 7 characters.)

Title: Pride
Text: Roland has experienced the power of the Golden Antibody firsthand, leaving him with only two options: to destroy it or to run…

Title: Unknown
Text: Nanami has a very unique action pattern, she flitted among the well-built defenses of the Golden Vortex…

Title: Wandering
Text: The Corrupted had the upper hand with their numbers and had wanted to exhaust Kamui by taking turns attacking, but it turned into a suffering for the Corrupted instead…

Title: The Truth
Text: After collecting information from different sources, the secret of the Golden Queen and Golden Antibody was uncovered. (This chapter requires 9 characters.)

Title: A Two-sided Problem
Text: No matter when, the Ascendants and Punishing are problems Kamui must face.

Title: Overall
Text: After communication was restored, Babylonia soldiers finally had a chance to request backup from HQ..

Title: The Fall of the Golden
Text: At the peak of the Golden Vortex, Babylonia soldiers confronted the Golden Queen...
